NK132(no)002:1: / /'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi 'grel
NK132(no)002:2: chung 'phags mchog rnams kyi rnam par thar pa mtha'
NK132(no)002:3: yas la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba /
NK132(no)002:4: de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad
NK132(no)002:5: dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la
NK132(no)002:6: phyag 'tshal lo // tshogs gnyis rgya mtsho las 'khrungs pa'i //
NK132(no)002:7: rdzogs sangs rgyas kun la btud de //
NK132(no)002:8: gang gi zhing dang rnam thar la //
NK132(no)002:9: 'jug pa'i sgo brgya dbye bar bya //
NK132(no)002:10: de la 'dir sangs rgyas phal bo che'i nang na
NK132(no)002:11: sdong po bkod pa'i mdo zhes bya ba byang chub
NK132(no)002:12: sems dpa'i spyod pa rab 'byams ston pa zhig bzhugs
NK132(no)002:13: pa'i mjug gi cha las bkol ba smon lam gyi
NK132(no)002:14: mdo 'di nyid su zhig gis btab ce na /
NK132(no)002:15: sngon gzhon nu nor bzang gis 'phags pa 'jam dpal
NK132(no)002:16: nas byams pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang
NK132(no)002:18: 'jam dpal gyi byin rlabs kyi mthus ye shes kyi
NK132(no)002:19: spyod yul yangs pa brnyes nas kun tu bzang po'i
NK132(no)002:20: spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug nus par gyur te
NK132(no)002:21: / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen du thob pa na /
NK132(no)002:22: des rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
NK132(no)002:23: ye shes kyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yas bkod pa'i sprin
NK132(no)002:24: chen po nas gzhon nu nor bzang la gsungs pa
NK132(no)002:26: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
NK132(no)002:27: kun tu bzang po nas bskal pa dang bskal par
NK132(no)002:28: 'byams klas pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas
NK132(no)002:30: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rdul
NK132(no)002:31: phra mo snyed pa dag bsnan te mngon par brjod
NK132(no)002:32: pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smon lam
NK132(no)002:33: btab pa / ji snyed su dag ces sogs 'byung ba yin no //
NK132(no)002:41: dang po ni rgya gar na skad rigs bzhi yod pa las sam skri ta'i skad du /
NK132(no)002:43: +aar+ya b+ha dra tsar+ya pra ni d+h+aa na r+aa dza /
NK132(no)002:44: zhes pa bod skad du bsgyur na /
NK132(no)002:45: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po /
NK132(no)002:47: 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs pas sam /
NK132(no)002:48: de'i spyod pa rnams smon lam du 'debs pa'i phyir /
NK132(no)002:49: yang na bzang po ni thog mtha' bar gsum du dge ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ste /
NK132(no)002:50: de thams cad yongs su 'dus pa'i smon lam gyi mdo chen po yin pas na rgyal po'o //
NK132(no)002:52: lo ts+aa bas 'gyur phyag mdzad pa'i snga logs su
NK132(no)002:53: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon
NK132(no)002:54: nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo bzhes bkod pa'o
NK132(no)002:55: // gnyis pa gzhung gi don la gsum ste /
NK132(no)002:56: sngon 'gro yan lag bdun pas rgyud dag par bya ba /
NK132(no)002:57: dngos gzhi smon lam gyi rab dbye rgyas par bshad pa /
NK132(no)002:58: rjes phan yon bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
NK132(no)002:60: phyag mchod bshags dang yi rang ba //
NK132(no)002:61: chos ston bskul dang bzhugs gsol bsngo //
NK132(no)002:62: dang po phyag 'tshal ba'i yan lag la bstan bshad gnyis las /
NK132(no)002:64: gang la na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa ste bgrangs pa las 'das pa na /
NK132(no)002:67: slad nas 'byon 'gyur te dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas /
NK132(no)002:68: 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bag tsha
NK132(no)002:69: ba dang bral bas mi yi seng ge gang su
NK132(no)002:70: dag ste / tshad med pa bzhugs pa kun lhag
NK132(no)002:71: ma cung zad kyang ma lus de dag thams cad
NK132(no)002:72: dag ste / la'o // gang gis na bdag gis so //
NK132(no)002:73: ji ltar na lus ngag yid rab tu dang ba ste dad pa chen po /
NK132(no)002:76: rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK132(no)002:77: gang la na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las rgyal ba sangs rgyas kun la'o //
NK132(no)002:79: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam ste /
NK132(no)002:80: byang chen gyi spyod pa la 'dun pa'i stobs dag
NK132(no)002:81: gis sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du mthong ngam ma
NK132(no)002:82: mthong yang yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te /
NK132(no)002:83: de dag re re'i drung du rang lus phyogs bcu'i
NK132(no)002:84: zhing gi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed du sprul
NK132(no)002:85: pa'i lus thams cad kyis rab tu btud pa yis
NK132(no)002:87: rdul phra rab gcig gi steng na'ang rdul ji snyed
NK132(no)002:88: pa de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas
NK132(no)002:89: rnams sangs rgyas rang rang gi sras byang chub sems
NK132(no)002:90: dpa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i dbus na dgos pa med
NK132(no)002:91: par bzhugs pa de dag ji lta ba de ltar
NK132(no)002:92: chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pa'i yul rnams ma lus
NK132(no)002:93: pa thams cad rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dag
NK132(no)002:94: gis yongs su gang bar mos te yid kyis dad
NK132(no)002:95: pa rab tu brtan pos 'dud do //
NK132(no)002:98: gang la na bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la'o //
NK132(no)002:100: bde bar gshegs pa de dag gi basngagasa pa yon
NK132(no)002:101: tan mi zad pa rgya mtsho lta bu rnams ngag
NK132(no)002:102: gi 'du byed dbyangs kyii yan lag rgya mtsho ltar
NK132(no)002:103: mtha' yas pa'i sgra skad kun gyis rgyal ba ma
NK132(no)002:104: lus pa kun gyi yon tan rab tu brjod pa'i
NK132(no)002:105: sgo nas so // gnyis pa mchod pa'i yan lag la gnyis te /
NK132(no)002:106: bla na yod pa dang med pa'o //
NK132(no)002:108: gang mngon sum du bzhugs pa dang yid kyi dmigs
NK132(no)002:109: pa'i rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bagyi'o
NK132(no)002:111: rnam par bkra ba'i me tog dang /
NK132(no)002:112: rin po che sogs kyi phreng ba dang /
NK132(no)002:113: 'bud dkrol brdung bya sogs sil 'khrol snyan pa'i sgra rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:114: dri zhim pa'i byug pa dang /
NK132(no)002:115: tsha gdung skyob byed rin po che'i gdugs dang rin po che'i 'od sogs me ri dang /
NK132(no)002:116: lhan skyes dang sbyar ba las byung ba'i bdug spos la sogs pa rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:117: gzhan yang srab 'jam mnyen pa'i na bza' rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:118: dri zhim gyi chag dar dang byug rdzas dri bzang
NK132(no)002:119: gi phye ma thum por byas pa phung por spungs
NK132(no)002:120: pa ri rab dang mnyam pa dang /
NK132(no)002:121: de dag thams cad kyang rgyu bzang ba /
NK132(no)002:122: dbyibs dod cing kha dog gsal bas mdzes pa sogs
NK132(no)002:123: bkod pas khyad par du 'phags pa kun dngos bshams
NK132(no)002:124: yid sprul gyi tshul gyis so //
NK132(no)002:125: de ltar bzang zhing bkod legs pas na dam pa dang mchog ces sgra sbyor /
NK132(no)002:126: bar 'di na bi kra ma la sh+ai la'i pan+di
NK132(no)002:127: ta mang+ga la sh+r+ai dz+ny+aa na'i phyag ris kyi rgya
NK132(no)002:129: rat+na sa ra b+hi tsa h+aa ra ba ra b+hih
NK132(no)002:130: di bya bi tsi tra be t+aa na ba ra
NK132(no)002:131: b+hih sarba d+ha dz+aa 'dir skad dod la d+ha dza
NK132(no)002:132: zhes dgod na'ang sdeb sbyor ma 'grigs shing /
NK132(no)002:133: ma dpe gcig na d+ha dza zhes zer ba sdeb sbyor ma 'grigs kyang brtag par bya'o //
NK132(no)002:134: gra pa t+aa ga sa ra b+hi su dza na
NK132(no)002:135: te sha dzi n+aa na ka ro meh zhes snang
NK132(no)002:136: ba zha lu lo chen gyis rin chen mchog dang
NK132(no)002:138: rnam bkra lha rdzas bla re mchog rnams dang //
NK132(no)002:139: rgyal mtshan mchog dang ba dan mchog kun gyi //
NK132(no)002:140: rgyal ba de dag la yang mchod par bgyi //
NK132(no)002:141: zhes bsgyur ba snang yang rgya 'grel dang bod dpe rnying pa kun na med do //
NK132(no)002:142: bla na med pa'i mchod pa ni /
NK132(no)002:143: mthu thob pa'i 'phags chen rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi
NK132(no)002:144: sprul pa'i mchod pa gang ji snyed pa de rnams
NK132(no)002:145: kyi gong na lha mi'i mchod rdzas gzhan med pas
NK132(no)002:147: phyogs dus kun 'gengs pas rgya che ba de dag
NK132(no)002:148: gis rgyal ba thams cad la yang lhag par mos
NK132(no)002:150: bzang po spyod pa la phan yon mtha' yas pa
NK132(no)002:151: yod par yid ches pa'i dad pa'i stobs dag gis
NK132(no)002:153: yul rgyal ba sras bcas kun la tshul des phyag 'tshal zhing mchod par bagyi'o //
NK132(no)002:154: gsum pa nyes pa bshags pa'i yan lag ni /
NK132(no)002:155: rgyu 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyis kun
NK132(no)002:156: nas bslang ba'i dbang gis na las srog gcod pa
NK132(no)002:157: sogs lus dang rdzun sogs ngag dang /
NK132(no)002:158: de bzhin du gnod sems sogs yid kyis kyang ste /
NK132(no)002:159: sgo gsum gyis byas sam byed du bcug gam /
NK132(no)002:160: byas pa la yi rang ba'i sdig pa gang byed
NK132(no)002:161: pa po bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa de
NK132(no)002:162: dag thams cad rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i spyan
NK132(no)002:163: sngar bdag gis 'gyod sdom gyi bsam pa drag pos
NK132(no)002:164: cho ga bzhin du so sor bshags par bagyi'o //
NK132(no)002:165: bzhi pa bsod nams la yi rang ba'i yan lag ni /
NK132(no)002:166: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas kun dang /
NK132(no)002:167: sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi sras byang sems rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:168: gsung gi sras nyan thos rgyun zhugs phyir 'ong phyir mi 'ong ste slob pa dang /
NK132(no)002:169: mi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang /
NK132(no)002:170: de'i phyogs su slob pa rang rgyal rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:171: so so'i skye bo'i 'gro ba ma lus pa kun gyi bsod nams te /
NK132(no)002:172: dge ba ci dang ci bgyis pa gang la'ang rab
NK132(no)002:173: tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod nams de dag kun
NK132(no)002:174: gyi rjes su bdag yi rang bar bagyi'o //
NK132(no)002:175: lnga pa chos 'khor bskor bar bskul ba'i yan lag ni /
NK132(no)002:176: gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na ma
NK132(no)002:177: rig pa'i mun par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams la
NK132(no)002:178: lam ston pas 'jig rten gyi sgron mar gyur pa'i
NK132(no)002:179: de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag byang chub sgrub pa'i
NK132(no)002:180: sa lam gyi rim pa ma lus pa bgrod de
NK132(no)002:181: / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang mngon par mdzad pas /
NK132(no)002:182: shes bya thams cad la ma chags ma thogs pa'i
NK132(no)002:183: ye shes bla na med pa brnyes pa'i mgon po
NK132(no)002:184: de dag thams cad la bdag gis dam pa'i chos
NK132(no)002:185: kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa'i bskor bar mdzod
NK132(no)002:187: drug pa mya las mi 'da' bar gsol ba'i yan lag ni /
NK132(no)002:188: mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams
NK132(no)002:189: la de bzhin gshegs pa gang yongs su mya ngan
NK132(no)002:190: las 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag
NK132(no)002:191: la / dgos pa 'gro ba kun la gnas skabs
NK132(no)002:192: su phan zhing mthar thug gi bde ba 'byung phyir
NK132(no)002:193: la / / dus bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas
NK132(no)002:194: kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad kyi rdul phra
NK132(no)002:195: rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam
NK132(no)002:196: pa bzhugs par yang bdag gis thal mo rab tu
NK132(no)002:197: sbyar te gsol ba 'debs par bagyi'o //
NK132(no)002:198: bdun pa dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu sbyar te bsngo ba'i yan lag ni /
NK132(no)002:199: gang bsngo na yul mchog la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
NK132(no)002:200: mchod pa gnyis kyis mchod cing /
NK132(no)002:201: stobs bzhi'i sgo nas rang rgyud kyi nyes byas bshags pa dang /
NK132(no)002:202: gzhan gyi dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
NK132(no)002:204: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol pa yis thob
NK132(no)002:205: pa'i dge ba cung zad bdag gis gang dang ci
NK132(no)002:207: bdag gzhan dus gsum gyi dge tshogs thams cad do //
NK132(no)002:208: gang du bsngo na srid pa'i bde ba dang nyan
NK132(no)002:209: rang gi byang chub tsam gyis ched du ma yin
NK132(no)002:210: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen po bla na med
NK132(no)002:211: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyir te /
NK132(no)002:212: ji ltar na 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i shes rab
NK132(no)002:213: kyis zin zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis 'phang ba'i
NK132(no)002:214: thabs mkhas zung du 'brel ba'i cho gas bsngo bar
NK132(no)002:215: bagyi'o // gnyis pa dngos gzhi smon lam gyi rab dbye rgyas par bshad pa la gnyis te /
NK132(no)002:216: dngos dang smon lam gyis mtha' brten pa'o //
NK132(no)002:217: dang po la spyi don bcu drug ste /
NK132(no)002:222: 6 / bshes bsten 7sangs rgyas mngon gyur dang //
NK132(no)002:226: spyi don dang po bsam pa dag pa'i sgo nas smon pa la don bzhi las /
NK132(no)002:227: dang po sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i bsam pa ni /
NK132(no)002:228: sngar byon zin 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:229: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
NK132(no)002:230: gang sems can gyi don la bzhugs pa thams cad
NK132(no)002:231: la mchod pa mtha' yas pas mchod par gyur cig
NK132(no)002:232: pa'o // gnyis pa dgongs pa yongs su bskang ba ni /
NK132(no)002:233: gang yang ma byon pa ste /
NK132(no)002:234: 'og min du sangs rgyas zin kyang gdul bya'i 'jig
NK132(no)002:235: rten du gang 'dul gyi sku ston pa'i dus la
NK132(no)002:236: ma bab pa'am / sa bcu rgyun mtha' la bzhugs
NK132(no)002:237: pa'i sems dpa' 'tshang rgya ma rag pa de dag
NK132(no)002:238: 'bad rtsol med bzhin du rab tu myur bar rang
NK132(no)002:239: rang gi dgongs pa'i bsam pa ma rdzogs pa ste
NK132(no)002:240: ma bab pa'am / / gdul bya smin pa'am /
NK132(no)002:241: tshogs lhag ma rdzogs nas dus la bab pas dga'
NK132(no)002:242: ldan du skye ba sogs nas byang chub brnyes pa'i
NK132(no)002:243: bar gyi go rim tshul dang mthun par ston pa'i
NK132(no)002:244: sgo nas sangs rgyas par byon cig pa ste /
NK132(no)002:245: rgyas zin rnams sprul skur ston cing sems dpa' rnams myur du sangs rgyas brnyes par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:246: gsum pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyang ba ni /
NK132(no)002:247: phyogs bcu ga la'i bar ma dag pa'i zhing rnams
NK132(no)002:248: ji snyed mchis pa de dag ma lus pa bde
NK132(no)002:249: ba can gyi zhing ji lta ba de bzhin du
NK132(no)002:250: rgya che zhing skyon dang bral bas yongs su dag
NK132(no)002:252: de dag kun tu yang byang chub kyi shing ljon
NK132(no)002:253: pa thams cad kyi dpang por gyur pa'i drung du
NK132(no)002:254: gshegs nas sangs rgyas zin pa'i rgyal ba dang /
NK132(no)002:255: de dag gi 'khor gyi khyams na sangs rgyas rnams
NK132(no)002:256: kyi thugs kyi sras byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
NK132(no)002:257: bar mtshams med par rab tu gang bar shog ste
NK132(no)002:258: snod bcud thams cad dag par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:259: bzhi pa sems can la phan gdags pa'i bsam pa ni /
NK132(no)002:260: phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed mchis pa
NK132(no)002:261: de dag dus rtag tu lus la nad med cing
NK132(no)002:262: sems la sdug bsngal med par bde ba phun sum
NK132(no)002:263: tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK132(no)002:264: der ma zad 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don
NK132(no)002:265: mtho ris dang thar pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i spyod pa
NK132(no)002:266: rnams byed pa po thams cad ni phan tshun blo
NK132(no)002:268: de'i mthus re ba'i don smon pa gang yod pa'ang de bzhin du 'grub par shog cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:269: spyi don gnyis pa byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i sgo nas smon pa la bdun las /
NK132(no)002:270: dang po tshe rabs dran pa ni /
NK132(no)002:271: gzhan don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems bskyed nas /
NK132(no)002:272: de dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod par byed cing /
NK132(no)002:273: de las 'jig rten pha rol tu 'phos te 'gro ba'i gang dang gang du skyes kyang rung ste /
NK132(no)002:274: de dag kun tu sngon gyi skye ba dran pas sngar bzhin spyod par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:275: gnyis pa rab tu 'byung ba ni /
NK132(no)002:276: de ltar tshe rabs kyi gnas skabs kun tu 'chi 'pho ba dang /
NK132(no)002:277: skye bas bsdus pa'i lus bzung bar gyur pa na /
NK132(no)002:278: ji srid gson pa'i bar dus rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:279: gsum pa spyod pa spyi dang tshul khrims dag pa la bslab pa ni /
NK132(no)002:280: rgyal ba kun gyis ji ltar bslab pa ltar de'i
NK132(no)002:281: rnam thar gyi rjes su slob pa la smon par
NK132(no)002:282: gyur te / ji ltar kun nas bzang po phyin
NK132(no)002:283: drug gi spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
NK132(no)002:284: la spyir slob par byed cing /
NK132(no)002:285: khyad par tshul khrims rnam pa gsum gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i dri ma med cing /
NK132(no)002:286: rang zhi bde'i sems kyi ma gos pa yongs su dag pa /
NK132(no)002:287: 'chal ba'i nyes pas rtag tu ma gos pas ma nyams la /
NK132(no)002:288: 'khor gsum du 'dzin pa dang bral bas skyon med pa ste /
NK132(no)002:289: de lta ba'i tshul khrims la spyod par shog cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:290: bzhi pa skad sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa ni /
NK132(no)002:291: gdul bya rnams smin par bya ba'i phyir du lha'i skad dang /
NK132(no)002:294: grul bum la sogs mi ma yin gzhan dag dang /
NK132(no)002:295: mi'i skad rigs tha dad pa rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:296: des mtshon te 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad rnams
NK132(no)002:297: ji tsam yod pa de tsam par thams cad kyi
NK132(no)002:298: skad du bdag gis chos bstan to ste ston par
NK132(no)002:299: shog cig pa'o // lnga pa dge ba la brtson pa ni /
NK132(no)002:300: des pa ni 'dzangs pa ste rgyud 'jam zhing zhib
NK132(no)002:301: pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la skyo dub
NK132(no)002:302: med par rab tu brtson pas slob par smon pa'o
NK132(no)002:303: // drug pa rgyu lnga po des byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa ni /
NK132(no)002:304: de ltar tshe rabs dran pa sogs lnga po sngon du 'gro bas /
NK132(no)002:305: sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'dod pa'i lhag bsam dang /
NK132(no)002:306: chos dbyings spros bral gyi ye shes la mnyam par
NK132(no)002:307: 'jog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis po
NK132(no)002:308: de ni dus gnas thams cad du nam yang brjed
NK132(no)002:310: bdun pa 'gal rkyen dang bral bar smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:311: de ltar byang sems mi brjed pa'i mthun rkyen tshang
NK132(no)002:312: nas de'i 'gal rkyen nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang
NK132(no)002:313: ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang bsags pa
NK132(no)002:314: rnams thar pa la sgrib par gyur pa ste /
NK132(no)002:315: de dag sa bon dang bcas pa thams cad ma lus yongs su byang bar shog cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:316: spyi don gsum pa ma gos pa'i sbyor ba'am ma chags pa'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:317: gang gis ma gos na mi dge ba'i las dang /
NK132(no)002:318: chags sogs nyon mongs pa dang /
NK132(no)002:319: dam pa'i chos sgrub pa la bar du gcod pa'i
NK132(no)002:320: bdud kyi las rnams las rnam par grol ba ste
NK132(no)002:321: / skyon gsum po des ma gos shing /
NK132(no)002:322: gang du na rang nyid gang du rgyu zhing spyod
NK132(no)002:323: pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ji snyed yod pa
NK132(no)002:324: rnams gang gang gang gi gnas su rgyu yang rung
NK132(no)002:325: ste / ji ltar spyod tshul ni /
NK132(no)002:326: dpe pad+mo chu nang du skyes kyang chu mi chags
NK132(no)002:327: pa bzhin du 'khor bar gnas kyang 'khor skyon gyis
NK132(no)002:329: nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med par rgyu ba
NK132(no)002:330: na sman shing lo 'bras bskyed cing smin pa sogs
NK132(no)002:331: gzhan don mang po spyod kyang rtsol rtog med pa
NK132(no)002:332: de ltar byang sems rnams 'gro ba la phan pa
NK132(no)002:333: rtag tu sgrub kyang lan la re ba dang rlom
NK132(no)002:334: sogs med par spyad pa spyod pa ltar bdag gis
NK132(no)002:335: kyang spyod nus par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:336: spyi don bzhi pa sems can phan bde la 'god pa'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:337: gang nas gzhal kyang tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK132(no)002:338: zhing gi rgya khyon dang phyogs bcu rnams kyi mtha'
NK132(no)002:339: ji tsam yod pa der ngan song gis mtshon pa'i
NK132(no)002:340: sems can ji snyed yod pa de thams cad kyi
NK132(no)002:341: sdug bsngal ma lus rab tu zhi bar byed pa
NK132(no)002:342: dang / mtho ris bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'gro ba kun dgod cing /
NK132(no)002:343: der ma zad 'gro ba de dag thams cad la
NK132(no)002:344: ni thar pa dam pa'i chos kyis phan pa dang
NK132(no)002:345: bde bar 'god pa'i spyad pa spyod nus par gyur
NK132(no)002:346: cig pa'o // spyi don lnga pa go cha bgo ba'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:347: rang smin pa'i phyir bdag nyid byang chub kyi rgyur
NK132(no)002:348: gyur pa'i spyod pa ni drug yongs su rdzogs pa
NK132(no)002:349: nyams su len pa ni brtson pa'i go cha bgo
NK132(no)002:350: bar byed cing / gzhan smin pa'i phyir sems can
NK132(no)002:351: rnams kyi khams dang mos dbang bag la nyal shes
NK132(no)002:352: bar byed cing / pas / de dag gang gis 'dul ba'i spyod pa dang mthun par 'jug ste /
NK132(no)002:353: zhugs nas kyang rang gis ji ltar rtogs pa'i bzang
NK132(no)002:354: po spyod pa dag gi chos ni rab tu ston
NK132(no)002:355: cing / spyod pa de la 'god pa'i go cha bgo bar bya'o //
NK132(no)002:356: de ltar na rdzogs pa dang 'jug pa dang zhugs nas chos ston pa ste /
NK132(no)002:357: rang gzhan gyi don gsum po de dus nyi tshe
NK132(no)002:358: tsam ma yin par ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa phyi
NK132(no)002:359: mtha' med pa'i bar de srid kun tu spyod par
NK132(no)002:360: gyur cig pa'o // spyi don drug pa skal mnyam gyi grogs dang 'grogs par smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:361: bdag byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa'i spyod pa la
NK132(no)002:362: sbyor ba na bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par spyod
NK132(no)002:363: pa'i grogs gang yin pa de dag dang yang rtag
NK132(no)002:364: tu mi 'bral bar 'grogs par shog cig 'grogs nas
NK132(no)002:365: kyang lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang
NK132(no)002:366: ste sgo gsum gyi spyod pa dag dang smon lam
NK132(no)002:367: rnams kyang gcig tu mthun par spyad cing 'debs par
NK132(no)002:368: gyur cig pa'o // spyi don bdun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing mnyes par byed pa ni /
NK132(no)002:369: bdag la bzang po spyod pa'i chos kyi lag len
NK132(no)002:370: rab tu ston par bgyid pas phan 'dogs par 'dod
NK132(no)002:371: pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi grogs po ste bla
NK132(no)002:372: ma dam pa gang mchis pa de dag dang yang
NK132(no)002:373: dus rtag tu 'phrad pa ste mjal bar shog cig
NK132(no)002:374: / mjal nas kyang bshes gnyen de dag bdag gis
NK132(no)002:375: dus nam du'ang thugs yid mi dbyung ba ste mnyes
NK132(no)002:376: pa'i thabs sgrub par shog cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:377: spyi don brgyad pa sangs rgyas mngon gyur la mchod pa'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:378: sangs rgyas kyi thugs sras byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
NK132(no)002:379: kyis yongs su bskor ba 'gro ba'i mgon po mi
NK132(no)002:380: dge ba'i chos las rgyal ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
NK132(no)002:381: rnams mngon sum du dus rtag tu bdag gis blta
NK132(no)002:383: gyur pa de nas bzung ste ma 'ongs bskal pa
NK132(no)002:384: kun tu yid mi skyo bar sangs rgyas sras dang
NK132(no)002:385: bcas pa de dag la'ang mchod pa'i bye brag rgya
NK132(no)002:386: cher bgyid par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:387: spyi don dgu pa dam chos 'dzin pa'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:388: rgyal ba rnams kyi lung gi dam pa'i chos ma
NK132(no)002:389: lus pa mi brjed pa'i gzungs kyis 'dzin par byed
NK132(no)002:390: cing / sems can rnams la byang chub spyod pa'i
NK132(no)002:391: lam kun tu ston pa'i sgo nas snang bar byed
NK132(no)002:392: cing / pa dang / rang nyid kyis bzang po
NK132(no)002:393: spyod pa blangs shing ci rigs pa sgrub pa de
NK132(no)002:394: nyid rnam par sbyong ba ste rtsal sbyong ba ltar
NK132(no)002:396: nad sbyong ba ltar dag par yang byed par gyur cig pa ste /
NK132(no)002:397: de la'ang ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' med pa kun tu spyad par bagyi'o zhes smon pa'o //
NK132(no)002:398: spyi don bcu pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnyed pa'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:399: khams gsum gyi srid pa thams cad du yang las
NK132(no)002:400: dang smon lam dang ting nge 'dzin dang dbang 'byor
NK132(no)002:401: ba'i stobs kyis 'khor zhing skye ba na bsod nams
NK132(no)002:402: dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag ni mi zad pa
NK132(no)002:403: rnyed par gyur pa las 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thabs
NK132(no)002:405: rten 'brel dang de bzhin nyid dang 'gro don spyod pa gsum mkhyen pa'i shes rab dang /
NK132(no)002:406: nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa dang /
NK132(no)002:407: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ting nge 'dzin gsum
NK132(no)002:408: sogs kyis sgrib gsum spangs pa las rnam grol gyi
NK132(no)002:410: de dag las byung ba'i yon tan mtha' yas pa
NK132(no)002:411: kun gyi mi zad pa'i mdzod brnyes par gyur cig
NK132(no)002:412: pa'o // spyi don bcu gcig pa 'jug pa du ma'i sgo nas smon pa 'jug pa brgyad las /
NK132(no)002:413: dang po zhing dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas blta ba la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:414: rdul gcig gi steng na yang rdul rnyed kyi sangs
NK132(no)002:415: rgyas kyi zhing rnams ma 'dres par mthong bar 'gyur
NK132(no)002:416: te / zhing de dang der grangs bsam gyis mi
NK132(no)002:417: khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi
NK132(no)002:418: sras byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs
NK132(no)002:419: te / pa la / de dag dang lhan cig
NK132(no)002:420: byang chub kyi spyad pa mtshungs par spyod cing skur
NK132(no)002:421: blta ba dang gsung mnyan par bgyid par smon pa
NK132(no)002:422: te / pa la / ste / de nyid gong
NK132(no)002:423: 'phel du gyur pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
NK132(no)002:424: pa thob pa'i dbang du byas nas rdul gcig la
NK132(no)002:425: rgyal ba'i zhing bkod pa de ltar ma lus shing
NK132(no)002:426: lus pa med pa thams cad kyi phyogs su yang
NK132(no)002:427: te / pa la / ste / / skra yi
NK132(no)002:428: rtse mo tsam gyi khyon la dus gsum du gshegs
NK132(no)002:429: shing 'byon pa'i tshad de snyed kyi sangs rgyas grangs
NK132(no)002:430: zad mi shes pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang /
NK132(no)002:431: rang rang gi zhing khams rnams kyang rgya mtsho ltar zad mi shes pa dang /
NK132(no)002:432: de dag kyang bskal pa rgya mtsho'i rdul ltar zad
NK132(no)002:433: mi shes pa'i bar de srid du bdag kyang zhing
NK132(no)002:434: khams de dag re rer byang chub kyi spyad pa
NK132(no)002:435: spyod cing zhal lta ba la rab tu 'jug par
NK132(no)002:436: smon pa'o // gnyis pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:437: sangs rgyas gcig gis gsung gcig bka' stsal pa la'ang
NK132(no)002:438: yan lag rgya mtsho ltar mtha' yas pa'i sgra skad
NK132(no)002:440: de nyid rgyal ba kun gyi gsung dbyangs yan lag
NK132(no)002:441: rnam par dag pa'i khyad chos tshang bar gyur pas
NK132(no)002:442: 'gro ba ma lus pa kun chos gang dang gang
NK132(no)002:443: nyan 'dod pa'i rang rang gi bsam pa ji bzhin
NK132(no)002:444: du gsung dbyangs mthun par 'jug pa de ltar sangs
NK132(no)002:445: rgyas thams cad kyi gsung mtha' yas pa go zhing
NK132(no)002:446: don sems pa la gcig gegs gcig gis mi byed
NK132(no)002:447: cing 'bad rtsol med par dus rtag tu 'jug par
NK132(no)002:449: gsum pa chos 'khor bskor ba la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:450: dus gsum du gshegs shing 'byon pa'i rgyal ba thams
NK132(no)002:451: cad dag gdul bya la chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul
NK132(no)002:452: rnams rab tu bskor ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi
NK132(no)002:453: yang gsung chos kyi sgra dbyangs mi zad par snang
NK132(no)002:454: ba la skad cig re la nyan nus pa'i blo
NK132(no)002:455: yi mthu thob pa'i stobs kyis bdag kyang gsung de
NK132(no)002:456: la rab tu 'jug par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:457: bzhi pa bskal pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:458: ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa ji snyed pa thams cad
NK132(no)002:459: ye shes kyi 'jug pas chags thogs med par yang
NK132(no)002:460: sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa de bzhin du bdag gis
NK132(no)002:461: kyang ye shes skad cig ma gcig gis 'jug par
NK132(no)002:463: des mtshon nas gang yang bskal pa 'das ma 'ongs
NK132(no)002:464: da ltar gyis bsdus pa dus gsum thams cad kyi
NK132(no)002:465: tshad ji tsam pa de dag thams cad dus skad
NK132(no)002:466: cig ma gcig gi cha shas su 'jug nus pa'i
NK132(no)002:467: stobs kyis sgrib pa med par de thams cad kyi
NK132(no)002:468: yul ni zhugs par gyur nas byang chub kyi spyad
NK132(no)002:469: pa spyod par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:470: lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bas 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:471: dus gsum du gshegs shing 'byon pa'i mi'i seng ge
NK132(no)002:472: sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag
NK132(no)002:473: thams cad skad cig ma gcig la bdag gis yongs
NK132(no)002:474: su blta zhing rtag tu de la 'jug par shog
NK132(no)002:475: cig pa'o // drug pa de'i spyod yul la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:476: dus rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
NK132(no)002:477: ni spyod yul rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi
NK132(no)002:478: khyab pa la mnyam bzhag spros bral gyi ye shes
NK132(no)002:479: rtogs pas rjes thob sgyu ma ltar snang bar gyur
NK132(no)002:480: pa'i mthus sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'i stobs
NK132(no)002:482: bdun pa zhing sgrub pa la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:483: gang yang byung ba dang 'byung ba'i dus gsum po
NK132(no)002:484: dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa de dag
NK132(no)002:485: mos pa dang / smon lam dang rdzu 'phrul gyi
NK132(no)002:486: stobs kyis rdul phran gcig gi steng na mngon par
NK132(no)002:487: sgrub cing de ltar sgrub pa bzhin du ma lus
NK132(no)002:488: shing lus pa med pa'i phyogs rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:489: dus thams cad kyi rdul re re bzhin gyi steng
NK132(no)002:490: du'ang rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing rnams bkod cing de
NK132(no)002:492: brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro ba la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:493: gang yang sngar ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang byed kyi sgron mar gyur pa rnams /
NK132(no)002:494: de dag so so rang rang gi mdzad pa rim pa ma 'chol bar 'tshang rgya ba dang /
NK132(no)002:495: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
NK132(no)002:496: mthar mya ngan las 'das pas rab tu zhi ba'i
NK132(no)002:497: mtha' ston par mdzad pa'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs
NK132(no)002:498: pa de dag kun gyi drung du bdag dus gcig
NK132(no)002:499: la mchi ste phyin nas thams cad kyi phrin las
NK132(no)002:500: byed pa por gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:501: spyi don bcu gnyis pa stobs kyi sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:502: skad cig gcig gis zhing tha dad par thogs med
NK132(no)002:503: du bgrod nus pas kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul
NK132(no)002:505: thabs tshul mtha' yas pas sems can thams cad la
NK132(no)002:506: kun nas phan pa'i sgor gyur pa'i sems bskyed bzhon
NK132(no)002:507: pa bzang po dang 'dra bas theg pa'i stobs rnams
NK132(no)002:510: tshad med bzhi sogs yon tan du ma 'grogs pa'i snyoms 'jug /
NK132(no)002:512: zil gnon mngon shes sogs kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang /
NK132(no)002:513: phan bde'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la kun
NK132(no)002:514: tu khyab pa byams sogs tshad med bzhi po dag
NK132(no)002:515: gi stobs dang / thog mtha' bar gsum kun nas
NK132(no)002:516: rab tu dge ba'i sbyin sogs bsod nams kyis stobs
NK132(no)002:517: gi stobs dang / rnams dang / dus gsum gyi
NK132(no)002:518: dngos po kun la chags pa dang thogs pa med
NK132(no)002:519: par gyur pa'i ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa'i stobs
NK132(no)002:520: gi stobs dang / rnams dang / dang / gnas
NK132(no)002:521: lugs ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i shes rab dang
NK132(no)002:522: gi stobs dang / rnams dang / dang / / gzhan don sgrub pa'i thabs mkhas dang /
NK132(no)002:523: mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul sogs kyi yon tan bskyed
NK132(no)002:524: pa'i rgyu dmigs pa rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK132(no)002:525: gyi stobs te stobs dgu po de dag gis bla
NK132(no)002:526: na med pa'i byang chub myur ba nyid du thob
NK132(no)002:527: pa'i stobs ye shes kyi khyad par rnams yang dag
NK132(no)002:528: pa nyid sgrub par byed par gyur cig pa'o //
NK132(no)002:529: spyi don bcu gsum pa sgrub pa'am gnyen po'i sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:530: 'khor bar 'phen byed las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag par byed cing /
NK132(no)002:531: sgo gsum rab tu ma zhi ba chags sogs nyon
NK132(no)002:532: mongs pa'i stobs rnams kun tu pham ste 'joms par
NK132(no)002:533: byed pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i bdud bzhi
NK132(no)002:534: las nyon mongs pa'i bdud sngar song bas lhag ma
NK132(no)002:535: gzhan gsum gyi stobs rnams ni phung po rang bzhin
NK132(no)002:537: sems nyid skye 'jig med pa dang /
NK132(no)002:538: yul gyi mngon zhen dag pas bcom ste stobs rab tu med par byed cing /
NK132(no)002:539: de ltar las nyon bdud kyi stobs gsum bcom pas
NK132(no)002:540: bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyid pa'i
NK132(no)002:541: thabs kyis sangs rgyas thob par smon pa'o //
NK132(no)002:542: spyi don bcu bzhi pa phrin las kyi sgo nas smon pa ni /
NK132(no)002:543: mkha' khyab kyi zhing rgya mtsho rnams ni rin po
NK132(no)002:544: che'i sa gzhi dang ljon pa sogs rnam par dag
NK132(no)002:546: de dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rgya mtsho dag
NK132(no)002:547: ni sdug bsngal dang sgrib pa las rnam par grol
NK132(no)002:549: lung rtogs kyi chos rgya mtsho rnams ni shes rab
NK132(no)002:550: kyi mig rnam par dag pas rab tu mthong bar
NK132(no)002:551: byed cing / ji lta ji snyed kyi chos mngon
NK132(no)002:552: sum du mthong ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho dag ni
NK132(no)002:553: yud tsam gyis rab tu rtogs par byed la /
NK132(no)002:554: spyod pa ste rang gzhan la phan pa'i thabs rgya
NK132(no)002:555: mtsho rnams ni legs par spyod pas skyon rnams rnam
NK132(no)002:556: par dag par byed cing bdag gzhan gyi don la
NK132(no)002:557: dmigs pa'i smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni rab tu
NK132(no)002:558: rdzogs pa ste 'bras bu 'grub pa byed pa dang
NK132(no)002:559: / sangs rgyas grangs med pa rgya mtsho lta bu
NK132(no)002:560: rnams ni mchod pa thams cad kyis rab tu mchod
NK132(no)002:561: / par byed cing / de ltar zhing dag pa
NK132(no)002:562: sogs kyi las bdun po de'ang bskal pa mtha' med
NK132(no)002:563: pa'i rgya mtsho lta bur mi skyo zhing rab tu
NK132(no)002:564: dga' ba'i bsam pas spyad par bgyi zhes smon pa'o
NK132(no)002:565: / par byed cing / // spyi don bco lnga
NK132(no)002:566: pa rjes su slob pa'i sgo nas smon pa la
NK132(no)002:567: / par byed cing / // gnyis las / dang po sangs rgyas kyi rjes su slob pa ni /
NK132(no)002:568: gang yang dus gsum du gshegs bzhugs 'byon par mdzad
NK132(no)002:569: pa'i rgyal ba grangs med pa yis sngon thog med
NK132(no)002:570: kyi dus nas brtsams te byang chub spyod pa'i smon
NK132(no)002:571: lam gyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
NK132(no)002:572: rnams kun ma lus pa bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi
NK132(no)002:573: bar smon te / de'ang nam rdzogs na bzang po
NK132(no)002:574: spyod pa spyad pa bla na med pa'i byang chub
NK132(no)002:575: tu sangs rgyas par gyur nas so //
NK132(no)002:576: gnyis pa sems dpa' mchog gnyis kyi /
NK132(no)002:577: dang po kun bzang gi rjes su slob pa ni /
NK132(no)002:578: rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi nang nas thu bor
NK132(no)002:579: gyur pa gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang po
NK132(no)002:580: zhes bya bar grags shing grub pa'i mkhas pa de
NK132(no)002:581: dang mtshungs par byang chen gyi spyod pa la spyad
NK132(no)002:582: pa'i phyir bdag gi dge ba 'di dag thams cad
NK132(no)002:583: rab tu bsngo bar bya ste /
NK132(no)002:585: gang 'dul gyi lus mtha' yas par ston pa dang /
NK132(no)002:586: ngag dbyangs gcig gis 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad mtha' yas par ston pa dang /
NK132(no)002:587: der ma zad rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting 'dzin
NK132(no)002:588: gyi sgo mtha' yas la 'jug pa'i yid kyang ste
NK132(no)002:589: / sgo gsum po rnam par dag cing phyin drug
NK132(no)002:590: gi spyod pa la mi mthun phyogs kyis mi bardzi
NK132(no)002:591: bas rnam par dag pa dang /
NK132(no)002:592: zhing ma dag pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa ste /
NK132(no)002:593: de ltar dag pa lnga po de thob pa'i ched
NK132(no)002:594: du bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa kun tu bzang
NK132(no)002:595: pos btab pa ci 'dra ba de 'drar bdag kyang
NK132(no)002:596: kun tu bzang po de dang mtshungs par shog cig
NK132(no)002:597: pa'o // gnyis pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su slob pa ni /
NK132(no)002:598: thog mtha' bar gsum kun nas dge ba'i chos bzang
NK132(no)002:599: po spyod pa spyad par bya ba'i phyir 'phags mchog
NK132(no)002:600: 'jam dpal gyis ni smon lam ji ltar btab pa
NK132(no)002:601: bzhin du spyad par bgyi bar smon te /
NK132(no)002:602: rgyal ba sras kyi smon lam de dag ma 'ongs
NK132(no)002:603: phyi mtha' med pa'i bskal pa kun tu mi skyo
NK132(no)002:604: bar dga' ba dang bcas pas sras rgyal ba de
NK132(no)002:605: dang de'i bzhed don gyi bya ba ma lus pa
NK132(no)002:606: bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi bar smon pa'o //
NK132(no)002:607: spyi don bcu drug pa kun gyi mjug bsdud pa'i sgo nas bsngo ba bstan pa ni /
NK132(no)002:608: bdag gis rgyu sbyin sogs spyod pa dag gi mtha'
NK132(no)002:609: ni 'di tsam mo zhes tshad bzung du yod par
NK132(no)002:610: ma gyur cig / rgyu de las byung ba'i 'bras
NK132(no)002:611: bu gzungs dang spobs pa sogs yon tan rnams kyang
NK132(no)002:612: tshad 'di tsam zhes bzung du med par shog cig
NK132(no)002:613: ma gyur cig / / de ltar spyod pa dang
NK132(no)002:614: yon tan tshad med pa la gnas par byas nas
NK132(no)002:615: kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag
NK132(no)002:616: gi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams
NK132(no)002:617: cad 'tshal bar bgyi ste thob par smon pa'o //
NK132(no)002:618: de dag gis smon lam gyi rab dbye dngos bshad zin to //
NK132(no)002:619: gnyis pa smon lam gyi mtha' brten pa ni /
NK132(no)002:620: nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ste phyogs bcu gang
NK132(no)002:621: nas gzhal kyang nam mkha' la mtha' med pa ji
NK132(no)002:622: tsam pa de thams cad sems kyis go mtshams med
NK132(no)002:623: par gang bas sems can ma lus pa'i mtha' yang
NK132(no)002:624: de bzhin du mtha' med pa ste /
NK132(no)002:625: sems can ji tsam par las dang nyon mongs pa'ang de tsam pas /
NK132(no)002:626: las nyon gyi matha'i tshad bzung du med par gyur
NK132(no)002:627: pa ltar bdag gi smon lam gyi mtha' yang de
NK132(no)002:629: gsum pa rjes phan yon bstan pas mjug bsdu ba la gnyis te /
NK132(no)002:630: smon lam gyi phan yon bshad pa dang phan yon can gyi smon lam nyid bsngo ba'o //
NK132(no)002:631: dang po la'ang bstan bshad bsdu gsum las dang po mdor bstan ni /
NK132(no)002:632: gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rab tu rgya che bas
NK132(no)002:633: mtha' yas pa rnams mchod pa'i khyad par rin chen
NK132(no)002:634: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan te rgyal ba
NK132(no)002:636: der ma zad lha dang mi'i rdzas dbang po so
NK132(no)002:637: so la bde ba mchog bskyed pa'i rgyu gzugs mdzes
NK132(no)002:638: pa dang / sgra snyan pa dang /
NK132(no)002:640: ro mngar ba sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan mtha' yas
NK132(no)002:641: pa rnams kyis kyang grangs med pa phyogs bcu'i zhing
NK132(no)002:643: dus ring ba bskal pa'i bar rgyun mi chad du
NK132(no)002:644: phul ba'i bsod nams bas skyes bu gang gis bsngo
NK132(no)002:645: ba'i rgyal po 'di thos shing don la nas bla
NK132(no)002:646: na med pa'i byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab
NK132(no)002:647: tu mos pa'i nges shes skyes shing /
NK132(no)002:648: skyes nas kyang yid dang ba'i dad pa mang du skyes na lta ci smos /
NK132(no)002:649: tha na lan gcig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa'i
NK132(no)002:650: bsod nams 'di ni snga ma de bas ches 'phags
NK132(no)002:651: pa'i bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba yin
NK132(no)002:652: no // gnyis pa rgyas bshad ni /
NK132(no)002:653: skyes bu gang zhig gis dad pa phun sum tshogs
NK132(no)002:654: pas bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di brtson pas
NK132(no)002:655: btab pa des ni phan yon bcu gsum po 'di
NK132(no)002:656: dag rim gyis thob par 'gyur te /
NK132(no)002:659: re zhig las dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba thams cad spangs par 'gyung zhing /
NK132(no)002:660: gnyis pa 'di phyi thams cad du sdig pa'i grogs
NK132(no)002:661: po ngan pa spangs te 'phrad par mi 'gyur ba
NK132(no)002:662: yin no // gsum pa de gnyis spangs par ma
NK132(no)002:663: zad sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas bde ba can
NK132(no)002:664: gyi zhing dang bcas pa de yang des myur bar
NK132(no)002:665: tshe 'di la mthong zhing phyi ma zhing der skye'o
NK132(no)002:666: yin no // // bzhi pa smon lam 'di la
NK132(no)002:667: brtson pa de dag 'bad rtsol med par mthun rkyen
NK132(no)002:668: tshang ste don chen 'grub pas na rnyed pa'i mchog
NK132(no)002:669: rab tu rnyed pa yin la /
NK132(no)002:670: lnga pa tshe gnas pa de srid du nyer 'tshe
NK132(no)002:671: med cing dge ba dang ma bral bar legs par
NK132(no)002:672: spyod pas bde bar 'tsho ba yin no //
NK132(no)002:673: drug pa mir gyur pa'i tshe 'dir yang de dag
NK132(no)002:674: mi lus don can du 'gyur bas legs par 'ongs
NK132(no)002:676: bdun pa ni phan yon drug po de tsam du
NK132(no)002:677: ma zad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
NK132(no)002:678: yon tan dang rnam 'phrul sogs gang mchis pa de
NK132(no)002:679: yang ci 'dra bar smon lam 'debs po de dag
NK132(no)002:680: dus ring por mi thogs par de bzhin du 'gyur
NK132(no)002:681: ro // brgyad pa skye ba snga phyi'i bar mtshams
NK132(no)002:682: med par dmyal bar 'phen par byed pa'i matsha mas
NK132(no)002:683: med pa zhes bya ba'i las lnga po ste pha
NK132(no)002:684: ma dgra bcom pa gsum gsod pa dang /
NK132(no)002:686: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung
NK132(no)002:687: ba dag gis sdig pa rnams las gang dang gang
NK132(no)002:688: skyes bu gang gis nyes dmigs mi shes pa'i dbang
NK132(no)002:689: gis sngar byas pa dag byed pa po de yis
NK132(no)002:690: dad pas bzang po spyod pa 'di nyid snying thag
NK132(no)002:691: pa nas brjod na myur du las de dag ma
NK132(no)002:692: lus pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba yin no
NK132(no)002:693: // dgu pa smon lam 'debs po gang zag des
NK132(no)002:694: ni 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK132(no)002:695: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang ni ldan par
NK132(no)002:696: // 'gyur ro // bcu pa lta na sdug pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK132(no)002:697: de'ang mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK132(no)002:698: rgyal rigs mchog sogs rigs phun sum tshogs par skyes pa dang /
NK132(no)002:699: kha dog gsal bas gzugs mdzes par 'gyur ba'am /
NK132(no)002:700: yang na kha dog gi skad dod war+na zhes pa
NK132(no)002:701: rus la'ang 'jug pas rus khung btsun par skye ba'i
NK132(no)002:702: yon tan la sogs pa rnams ldan par 'gyur ro
NK132(no)002:703: // bcu gcig pa bdud dang mi stegs rgol ba
NK132(no)002:704: mang pos kyang smon lam 'debs mkhan de mi thub
NK132(no)002:705: ste glags lta bar mi nus so //
NK132(no)002:706: bcu gnyis pa sa 'og sa steng sa blar spyod
NK132(no)002:707: pa'i 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang smon lam 'debs
NK132(no)002:708: pa po de la 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod
NK132(no)002:709: cing gus pa dang phan 'dogs byed par 'gyur ro
NK132(no)002:710: // bcu gsum pa smon lam 'debs pa po de
NK132(no)002:711: nyid smon lam mthar phyin pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs te
NK132(no)002:712: byang chub kyi shing gi dbang po'i drung du gang
NK132(no)002:714: der song nas kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir shing drung der 'dug ste /
NK132(no)002:715: bdud sde dpung dang bcas pa thams cad btul nas
NK132(no)002:716: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
NK132(no)002:717: par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
NK132(no)002:719: gsum pa don bsdu ba ni /
NK132(no)002:720: gang zag bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal
NK132(no)002:721: po 'di'i don dang tshig dang de glegs bam la
NK132(no)002:723: kha bton nam gzhan la ston tam /
NK132(no)002:724: glegs bam klog par byed na'ang rung ste de yi
NK132(no)002:725: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni bsam gyis mi
NK132(no)002:726: khyab pa'i phyir ji bzhin pa ni sangs rgyas nyid
NK132(no)002:727: kyis mkhyen pa las gzhan nyan rang 'phags pa sogs
NK132(no)002:728: kyi'ang spyod yul ma yin na so skyes lta bu
NK132(no)002:729: smos te de'i 'bras bu mthar thug byang chub kyi
NK132(no)002:730: mchog rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ba la
NK132(no)002:731: som nyi ma byed cig ste thob nges pa'o //
NK132(no)002:732: gnyis pa phan yon can gyi smon lam nyid bsngo ba la lnga las /
NK132(no)002:733: dang po sems pa mchog gis bsngosa pa la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:734: 'phags pa 'jam dpal shes rab mchog gis dngos 'dzin
NK132(no)002:735: 'joms shing 'gro ba'i don la dpa' bor gyur pa
NK132(no)002:736: des ji ltar thugs su chud cing mkhyen pa ltar
NK132(no)002:737: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po de'ang de kho na
NK132(no)002:738: bzhin te / de ltar sems dpa' mchog de dag
NK132(no)002:739: kun gyi rjes su bdag kyang zhugs nas de dang
NK132(no)002:740: 'dra bar slob par 'dod cing 'dun pas bzang po
NK132(no)002:741: spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa las byung ba'i dge
NK132(no)002:742: ba ci mchis pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu
NK132(no)002:743: bzhin te / bsngo bar bagyi'o // gnyis pa rgyal bas bsngosa pa la 'jug pa ni /
NK132(no)002:744: dus gsum du 'gro don la byon gshegs mdzad pa'i
NK132(no)002:745: rgyal ba thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu bzang zhing
NK132(no)002:746: rgya che ba'i bsngo ba gang la mchog tu basngagasa
NK132(no)002:747: shing bstod par mdzad pa'i bsngo ba des /
NK132(no)002:748: 'di ltar smon lam btab pa la sogs pa las
NK132(no)002:749: byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun
NK132(no)002:750: kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob pa'i phyir
NK132(no)002:752: gsum pa smon lam gyis 'bras bu mngon gyur du bsngo ba ni /
NK132(no)002:753: bdag ni nam 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa
NK132(no)002:754: na las nyon gyi sgrib pa spyi dang khyad par
NK132(no)002:755: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gegs la sogs pa thams cad
NK132(no)002:756: dag ni phyir bsal zhing med par byas te /
NK132(no)002:757: mngon sum du sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas nyid mthong bar 'gyur la /
NK132(no)002:758: de na mthong bas slar yang sgrib pa mang po
NK132(no)002:759: byang zhing ting 'dzin gyi sgo du ma thob nas
NK132(no)002:760: / de las mi g.yo bzhin du bde ba can
NK132(no)002:761: gyi zhing der yud tsam gyis rab tu 'gro zhing
NK132(no)002:762: / / der song nas ni pad+ma la bardzusa te
NK132(no)002:763: skyes nas bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di nyid
NK132(no)002:764: btab pa'i 'bras bu de dag kyang thams cad ma
NK132(no)002:765: lus pa mngon du 'gyur bar shog la /
NK132(no)002:766: bdag gi smon lam gyi 'bras bu de dag ma
NK132(no)002:767: lus pas rang gi rgyud yongs su bkang zhing gzhan
NK132(no)002:768: gyi re ba kun kyang skong bar byas nas 'jig
NK132(no)002:769: rten ji srid gnas pa de srid du sems can
NK132(no)002:770: thams cad la phan par bgyid par gyur cig pa'o
NK132(no)002:771: // bzhi pa sangs rgyas las dngos su lung bstan thob par bsngo ba ni /
NK132(no)002:772: rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i khor gyi dkyil
NK132(no)002:773: 'khor yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pas bzang zhing
NK132(no)002:774: / nang du ting 'dzin dang phyi rol tu smon
NK132(no)002:775: lam gyi mthus grub pa'i bde skyid phun sum tshogs
NK132(no)002:776: pas dga' bar gyur pa der rin po che'i pad+mo
NK132(no)002:777: dam pa shin tu mdzes pa'i ze'u 'bru'i khang pa
NK132(no)002:778: las bardzusa te skyes nas rgyal ba snang ba mtha'
NK132(no)002:779: yas kyis mngon sum du khyod zhing khams ga ge
NK132(no)002:780: mor dus 'di zhes bya bar sangs rgyas 'di lta
NK132(no)002:781: bur 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i lung
NK132(no)002:782: bstan pa'ang bdag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der thob
NK132(no)002:784: lnga pa lung bstan thob nas sems can la phan pa sgrub par bsngo ba ni /
NK132(no)002:785: bde ba can gyi zhing der ni bdag gis lung
NK132(no)002:786: bstan de lta bu rab tu thob nas sprul pa
NK132(no)002:787: mang po bye ba phrag brgya la sogs pa mtha'
NK132(no)002:788: yas pa yis gzhan don la blo rtse gcig tu
NK132(no)002:789: gzhol ba'i stobs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
NK132(no)002:790: rnams su skad cig re rer yang sems can mtha'
NK132(no)002:791: yas pa rnams la sdug bsngal skyob pa nas brtsams
NK132(no)002:792: te mngon mtho'i bde ba dang /
NK132(no)002:793: nges par legs pa'i byang chub gsum la rim par
NK132(no)002:794: 'god pa'i bar gyis phan pa mang po 'khor ba
NK132(no)002:795: ji srid pa de srid du bgyi bar shog cig
NK132(no)002:796: /'di'i rjes su bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bton
NK132(no)002:797: pa yi / zhes sogs sho lo ka gnyis po sdong po bkod pa'i mdo dang /
NK132(no)002:798: rgya 'grel gzhan rnams na med mod 'on kyang mang
NK132(no)002:799: ga la sh+ri dz+ny+aa na'i phyag ris kyi rgya dper
NK132(no)002:800: 'byung zhing / sh+aakya bshes gnyen gyi rgya 'grel dang /
NK132(no)002:801: lo tsa chen po ye shes sdes kyang bshad pa
NK132(no)002:802: mdzad pas mdo tshig yin par bya dgos zhes mkhas
NK132(no)002:804: des na sdong po bkod pa las tshig bcad drug cu dang /
NK132(no)002:805: de'i steng gnyis po bsnan pas drug cu re gnyis
NK132(no)002:806: ni rgya dpe mang nyung gi khyad par du snang
NK132(no)002:807: la / 'di nyid zur du bkol ba'i sgos kyi
NK132(no)002:808: glegs bam bod ma kun gyi gsham du smon lam
NK132(no)002:809: rgyal po 'di dag mchog gi gtso bo sogs tshigs
NK132(no)002:810: bcad gcig 'byung ba ni mdo dang 'grel ba rnams
NK132(no)002:811: la / na med cing / lo ts+aa ba chen
NK132(no)002:812: po bee ro tsa nas 'gyur gyi smon lam du
NK132(no)002:813: mdzad pa yin no zhes kyang grags te /
NK132(no)002:814: de ltar don la gnas sam snyam mo //
NK132(no)002:815: tshigs su bcad pa gsum po 'di yang cung zad
NK132(no)002:816: bshad na do na gsum ste smon lam bton pa
NK132(no)002:817: dang / smon lam bsngosa pa dang ma /
NK132(no)002:818: smon lam gyi dge rtsa phyir bsngo ba gsum las /
NK132(no)002:820: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi glegs bam bklags
NK132(no)002:821: sam kha ton du bton pa'i dge ba cung zad
NK132(no)002:822: bdag gis ci bsags pa de ni 'gro ba sems
NK132(no)002:823: can ma lus pa'i yid la smon pa'i don grub
NK132(no)002:824: par shog ces brjod pa smon lam du byas pa'i
NK132(no)002:825: dge ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du yun ring
NK132(no)002:826: por mi thogs par dus skad cig gis 'bad rtsol
NK132(no)002:827: mi dgos par thams cad 'byor zhing 'grub par shog
NK132(no)002:829: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam yongs su bsngosa pa
NK132(no)002:830: 'di yis bsod nams ngo bo bzang bas dam pa
NK132(no)002:831: dang rgya che bas mtha' yas par gyur pa gang
NK132(no)002:832: zhig thob pa des 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyi chu
NK132(no)002:833: bor bying nas nyam thag pa rnams de bzhin gshegs
NK132(no)002:834: pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i bzhugs gnas bde ba
NK132(no)002:835: can gyi zhing khams rtag tu bde zhing skyid pa'i
NK132(no)002:836: gnas de rab tu thob par shog ste der skye
NK132(no)002:839: smon lam rgyal po 'di dag gis ni mchog gi
NK132(no)002:840: gtso bo bla na med pa'i byang chub 'grub pa
NK132(no)002:841: dang / mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba sems
NK132(no)002:842: can kun la gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phan
NK132(no)002:844: thams cad kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis brgyan
NK132(no)002:845: pa'i zhing khams khyad par can du sgrub pas grub
NK132(no)002:846: ste'am / yang na dpe phal che bar gzhung grub ste zhes pa ltar na /
NK132(no)002:847: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa
NK132(no)002:848: sras dang bcas pa'i spyod pa rab 'byams mdzes byed
NK132(no)002:849: zab cing rgya che ba'i tshig dang don gyis rnam
NK132(no)002:850: par brgyan pa'i smon lam gyi mdo chen po gsungs
NK132(no)002:851: pa'i gzhung 'di las ji skad 'byung ba de kho
NK132(no)002:852: na bzhin du grub par gyur te phyogs bcu'i zhing
NK132(no)002:853: kun gyi ngan song gi rgyud rnams ma lus pa
NK132(no)002:855: gsum pa mjug gi don ni /
NK132(no)002:856: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal
NK132(no)002:857: po rdzogs so zhes pa ste bshad pa mthar phyin
NK132(no)002:858: pas don no // rgya dpe gcig na /
NK132(no)002:859: +aar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra tsar+ya pra ni d+h+aa na r+aa dza sam sta m+aa /
NK132(no)002:861: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so //
NK132(no)002:864: e ka g+aa th+aa tsa tur+g+aa th+aa g+aa th+aa d+w+aa t+ai ya d+ha ra ni /
NK132(no)002:865: shat+mu kh+ai b+ha dra tsar+ya tsa pany+tsa mu d+r+aahpra k+ai t+ti r+aa zhes 'byung /
NK132(no)002:867: tshigs bcad gcig dang tshigs bcad bzhi //
NK132(no)002:868: tshigs bcad gnyis pa yi ni gzungs //
NK132(no)002:869: sgo drug pa dang bzang spyod rnams //
NK132(no)002:870: phyag rgya lnga ru rab tu grags //
NK132(no)002:872: 'phags mchog rnam thar mtha' yas la 'jug pa'i //
NK132(no)002:873: zab cing rgya che'i smon lam rmad byung sgo //
NK132(no)002:874: legs bshad 'phrul gyi phyi des ma lus 'gro //
NK132(no)002:875: kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog grub par shog //
NK132(no)002:876: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi 'grel
NK132(no)002:877: chung 'phags mchog rnams kyi rnam par thar pa mtha'
NK132(no)002:878: yas la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni
NK132(no)002:879: rgyal tshab mchog gi sprul pa'i sku'i zham ring gi
NK132(no)002:880: mthu bo ma ti swa ra swa sti'i gsung gis
NK132(no)002:881: bskul ba ltar smyos kyi dge slong rmongs pa d+harma
NK132(no)002:882: sh+r+ais lcags sbrul s+n+ron zla'i tshes bcu chen mo'i dus
NK132(no)002:883: mchod kyi nyin o rgyan smin grol gliing gi chos
NK132(no)002:884: grwar sbyar ba yin pas yi ge 'di 'bri mi
NK132(no)002:885: ni bag gros bris pa yin lags pa ni dge
NK132(no)002:886: ba ci bsam 'grub par shog cig //
NK132(no)002:891: sangs rgyas sku gsum brnyes pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK132(no)002:892: chos nyid mi 'gyur bden pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK132(no)002:893: dge 'dun mi phyed 'dun pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK132(no)002:894: ji ltar bsngosa bzhin smon lam 'grub par shog /
NK132(no)002:895: tad+ya th+aa pany+tsan+d+ri ya a wa bo d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
